text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to state that in the American system, the copyright holder could choose to pursue actual damages or statutory damages. The candidate answer mentions statutory damages in the US section (\"Statutory damages available ($750\u2013$30,000 per work; up to $150,000 for willful infringement)\") but it fails to explicitly mention the option to pursue *actual damages* alongside statutory damages, which is a key component of the required statement.", "criterion_id": "661ecb64-b694-403f-97ea-781b4eca98f4"}
